question.text:
Match the following.
  Column I   Column II
A Epinephrine  i Stimulates muscle growth
B Testosterone   ii The decrease in blood pressure
C Glucagon iii Breakdown of liver glycogen
D Atrial natriuretic factor iv Increases heartbeat

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

solution.text:
A. Epinephrine increases the alertness, pupillary dilation, piloerection (raising of hairs), sweating, etc. The hormone increases the heartbeat, strength of heart contraction and the rate of respiration.

B. Testosterone is responsible for muscular growth, aggressiveness, development of facial and axillary hair, low pitch of voice, etc.

C. Glucagon functions as 1. Stimulating glycogenolysis. 2. Stimulating the process of gluconeogenesis. 3. Reducing cellular glucose uptake and utilization.

D. Atrial natriuretic factor - ANF is a peptide hormone secreted from the atrial wall. Whenever there is an increase in blood pressure → release of ANF → dilation of the blood vessels → decreases in blood pressure.
